trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Vishrahd is looking at you impatiently.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_TODO_00<tab>Feed the hamsa appropriately.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Vishrahd.

TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_VISHRAHD_000_001<tab>You must be the substitute hamsa-keeper. Well, you're late! Feeding time was supposed to start bells ago! And a hungry hamsa is a noisy hamsa, as you can hear for yourself.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_VISHRAHD_000_002<tab>What're you standing around for? Are you going to leave those poor creatures to starve to death? Get to work! Chop-chop!
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_VISHRAHD_000_003<tab>Here you go─one large feed bag, and one small. Hamsa of different stature have different diets, you see. And they're finicky eaters, to boot.

TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_VISHRAHD_000_004<tab>The smaller ones require only a simple mix of greens and grains. But our big boys also need a helping of silkworm pupae for extra protein. The foodstuffs are next to that wooden crate over there. Now get to it!

TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_VISHRAHD_000_005<tab>How many times do I have to explain it? The smaller hamsa only get greens and grains. The larger hamsa get silkworms as well. The foodstuffs are over there by the crate. Now, chop-chop!
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_Q1_000_000<tab>Which bag will you scoop the grain into?
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A1_000_001<tab>The small feed bag.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A1_000_002<tab>The large feed bag.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A1_000_003<tab>Neither.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_Q2_000_000<tab>Which bag will you scoop the silkworms into?
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A2_000_001<tab>The small feed bag.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A2_000_002<tab>The large feed bag.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A2_000_003<tab>Neither.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_Q3_000_000<tab>Which bag will you scoop the vegetable scraps into?
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A3_000_001<tab>The small feed bag.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A3_000_002<tab>The large feed bag.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A3_000_003<tab>Neither.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_Q4_000_000<tab>Dispose of the feed bag's contents?
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A4_000_001<tab>Empty the small feed bag.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A4_000_002<tab>Empty the large feed bag.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_A4_000_003<tab>Keep the bags as they are.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_04214_Q5_000_000<tab>Are you sure you wish to discard the contents of your feed bag?
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_SYSTEM_100_006<tab>That particular food is already in your feed bag.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_SYSTEM_200_006<tab>You unceremoniously heap feed into your bag.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_SYSMES_000_006<tab>The hamsa flaps its wings and its eyes light up with gastronomic delight!
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_SYSMES_000_007<tab>The hamsa shuns the bag and stares blankly skyward as if forsaken by the gods. Perhaps the feed mix is wrong?
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_SYSTEM_100_007<tab>The hamsa stares off happily into space, its belly sated.
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_SYSTEM_200_007<tab>The hamsa is eyeing you expectantly...
TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_VISHRAHD_000_008<tab>Done already? Perhaps you're not as hopeless as you look. But you'd better be on time for the next feeding. Er, what was your name again?

TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_VISHRAHD_000_009<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Wait, you don't mean... <var 1A 02 /var>That<var 1A 01 /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? The adventurer who rescued Matsya from the beasts!?

TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_VISHRAHD_000_010<tab>My most sincere apologies! I never imagined a hero like you would simply be walking amongst us...and slopping the hamsa, besides! Heavens, my face must be so red right now...

TEXT_AKTKZF019_04274_VISHRAHD_000_011<tab>Anyhow, er...I thank you for a job well done. Here's your pay for today's work. Now, I'd best hunt down the <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> substitute hamsa-keeper.
